markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Implement Initiate](/Feats.aspx?ID=3746) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 49</row>

**Archetype** [Thaumaturge](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=186)

**Prerequisites**
[Thaumaturge Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3743)

</column>

---

You gain your implement's initiate benefit. If the benefit affects the target of [Exploit Vulnerability](/Actions.aspx?ID=1227), for you it affects the target of [Glimpse Vulnerability](/Feats.aspx?ID=3743) instead.
name: Implement Initiate
